sentence: The image is an advertisement for the "trivago - Hotel & Motel Deals" app on Google Play.
sentence_cn: 该图片是 Google Play 上“trivago - Hotel & Motel Deals”应用程序的广告。

sentence: At the top, there is a grayscale image of a city skyline with mountains in the background, possibly Los Angeles.
sentence_cn: 顶部是城市天际线的灰度图像，背景是山脉，可能是洛杉矶。

sentence: Below the image, the trivago logo is displayed.
sentence_cn: 图像下方显示了 trivago 徽标。

sentence: The ad provides the following details:
sentence_cn: 广告提供了以下详细信息：

sentence: - A tagline that reads: "Find your Ideal Hotel 1,000,000+ Hotels, 1 App"
sentence_cn: - 标语为：“1,000,000+ 家酒店，1 个应用程序，找到您的理想酒店”
words: Find your Ideal Hotel 1,000,000+ Hotels, 1 App

sentence: The ad features buttons with the options "NO THANKS" and "INSTALL" to download the app.
sentence_cn: 广告中含有“不用了”和“安装”按钮，用于下载应用程序。

sentence: The Google Play logo is also present.
sentence_cn: 其中还出现了 Google Play 标志。
